general.roles: Carry, Support, Disabler, Initiator, Durable, Nuker

facet_1.name: High Tide
facet_1.effects: Reduces Tidebringer cooldown per enemy hero hit.

facet_2.name: Grog Blossom
facet_2.effects: Grants the Admiral's Rum buff to allied units within the radius centered around the Return unit. The buff applied corresponds to Ghostship's current level.

effects: Launches a fleet of 2 ships on a 2.5 second interval
Each ship now also fires 3 waves of cannonballs from the port and starboard side that deal 40% of Ghostship's damage as they pass through enemies
Calls upon a tidal wave from behind Kunkka that deals damage, disarms, and drags enemy units along it

abilities.name: Admiral's Rum
abilities.description: Douses himself with the Admiral's signature rum upon taking additional player-based damage instances when reaching a certain health threshold. The Rum buff grants bonus movement speed and damage reduction for a period of time.
abilities.details: Deleterious to landlubbers, no one holds their rum like a sailor.

ability_1.name: Torrent
ability_1.details: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, stuns and hurls enemy units into the sky.
ability_1.description: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
interaction_notes: Displays an ally-only visual radius indicator upon cast
Plays an ally-only sound effect upon cast
Grants 3.13-second 350-radius vision centered on effect radius upon cast

ability_2.name: Tidebringer
ability_2.details: Grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
ability_2.description: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

facet_effects.high_tide: Reduces Tidebringer cooldown per enemy hero hit by 0.8 seconds
facet_effects.slow_effect: 60% movement speed slow for 1 second with talent

interaction_notes: Active attack modifier with autocast on by default
Deals physical spell damage corresponding to attack damage value

ability_3.name: X Marks the Spot
ability_3.details: Targets a hero, marks its position with an X, and returns it to the X after several seconds.
ability_3.description: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

facet_effects.grog_blossom: Grants Admiral's Rum buff to allied units within 400 radius (500 with talent) centered around the returned unit for 3 seconds with damage reduction corresponding to Ghostship's current level

technical_details: Grants 5.94-second 400-radius vision centered around target upon cast
interaction_notes: More effective while targeting an ally
Considers clones, illusions and creep-heroes as heroes
Disable Help on Kunkka prevents ability being cast on allied hero

ability_4.name: Tidal Wave
ability_4.details: Calls upon a tidal wave from behind Kunkka that deals damage, disarms, and drags enemy units along it.
ability_4.description: A good sailor knows the timing of the tides like the back of his hand.
interaction_notes: Tidal Wave starts from behind where Kunkka is facing
Affects units up to 2150-2250 distance away
Grants 2-second 200-radius vision around affected enemy units

ability_5.name: Ghostship
ability_5.details: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage.
ability_5.description: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
interaction_notes: Allied heroes touched by Ghostship receive Admiral's Rum buff
Spawns 2000-distance away opposite of targeted direction
Has 650 projectile speed and reaches crash location in 3.08 seconds
With Scepter: launches fleet of 2 ships with cannonball volleys dealing 40% damage

changes: X Marks the Spot Grog Blossom: Kunkka always applies Admiral's Rum buff on self when X Marks the Spot expires or upon Return sub-ability cast
Increased Tidebringer damage bonus from 30/60/90/120 to 35/70/105/140
Talents: LVL 10 +25% X Marks the Spot movement speed change â†’ -15s Admiral's Rum cooldown
LVL 15 +60 Tidebringer attack damage bonus increased to +70
LVL 15 +20% Torrent damage/knock up duration increased to +25%
LVL 25 +100% Tidebringer cleave damage increased to +200%
